headline: ExxonMobil makes huge Middle East bet amid shakeup
summary: ExxonMobil—the second largest oil and gas company by market cap and fourth largest by revenue—is engaged in a cost-cutting restructuring. However, the changes, including many layoffs, aren't keeping it from making a big bet in the Middle East. The company has inked an agreement to develop the ...
